duties_responsibilities.duty: Generating a book of residual income through outbound sales activities and business development.
Identifying and prioritizing sales opportunities to maximize revenue growth.
Engaging in face-to-face meetings, networking, and portfolio building to promote and sell products and services.
Maintaining client relationships to drive future revenue growth and renewal.
Utilizing a custom CRM platform for client acquisition and management.
Participating in critical business discussions and negotiations with business owners.
Participating in sales training and continuous professional development to enhance sales skills.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
